author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Upon mighty seas of commerce, fair Copper's vessel teeters,
For now, the sacred dragon's bank convenes for fateful meeting,
Gathered thoughts be like the storms, upon their brows, to weather,
Base metals ebb and flow, whilst China's might prepares for leeching.

In halls where Shores of Silicon do rule o'er coin and trade,
The serpent SVB divests herself of Securities most vaunted,
Thus, Leerink Partners' mighty strength returns in swift cascade,
By leaders' hands, their fate is sealed, the path of change anointed.

Through lands and seas, the morrows hold uncertain tides for all,
The chambers of the FTSE 100, bore witness to decline,
From distant shores, as East's great skin, as dragon scales, thus fall,
And prudent traders shiver, as harbingers of fate intertwine.

feedItems.title: Copper Weakens Ahead of China Central Bank Meeting
feedItems.description: Copper prices slipped and other base metals were mixed, as traders nervously awaited a Chinese central bank meeting on Tuesday at which officials are broadly expected to cut interest rates to support the economy following a stretch of weak data releases.

feedItems.title: SVB Securities to Be Acquired in Management Buyout
feedItems.description: The investment-banking business tied to Silicon Valley Bank will go back to being called Leerink Partners.

feedItems.title: FTSE 100 Falls After Asia Stocks Decline
feedItems.description: The FTSE 100 fell 0.3% in early trading, tracking declines in Asian equities as concerns over China’s economic outlook weighed on sentiment.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In lands afar where dragons dwell,
And fears of China's stats dispel,
The darkened oil doth bend and quell,
For hope's swift flight, none can foretell.

As Sterling rises, bold and free,
In RBC's sagacious decree,
To sell the Euro as they see,
Ere'r moves the BOE grand spree.

A wondrous deal hath Michelin sought,
With Flex Composite, dearly bought,
For €700 million wrought,
Shall earnings margin grace, they thought.

feedItems.title: Oil Dips on China Growth Fears
feedItems.description: Oil prices fell as investors continued to worry about the Chinese economy, with recent weak data undermining hopes that China’s postpandemic recovery would boost demand for crude.

feedItems.title: RBC Advises Selling Euro Vs Sterling Ahead of BOE Decision
feedItems.description: Sterling could rise as the BOE’s meeting Thursday might prompt the market to raise its U.K. interest rate expectations, RBC Capital Markets said, advising selling EUR/GBP, targeting 0.8370 and placing a stop loss at 0.8600.

feedItems.title: Michelin Buys High-Tech Fabrics Engineer
feedItems.description: Michelin has acquired Flex Composite from private-equity firm IDI for €700 million, expecting the deal to gradually increase its underlying earnings margin.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In lands afar or potentate's zone,
In ten-year Bunds, yields descendeth lone,
Two to five, the range Morgan chime,
German gales doth blow, lower realms soon climb.

Aloft betide the dauntless MTU,
Margin rise, in winds they steer anew,
Eight hundred millions in twenty-three,
Harbinger of aero splendor, free.

Winds apropos amid AI and Fed,
By tech-stock force, discord begets dread,
In night-gloaming are we vestiges,
Or dawn's break, betwixt dreams and hedges?

feedItems.title: Ten-Year Bund Yield Seen Falling Toward Bottom of Range In Coming Months
feedItems.description: Ten-year German Bund yields are expected to fall to the lower end of the 2%-2.5% trading range over the coming months, Morgan Stanley said, affirming its previous expectations.

feedItems.title: MTU Aero Lifts Operating Margin Guidance
feedItems.description: MTU Aero Engines said it expected adjusted earnings for 2023 above €800 million, equivalent to a slight increase in the 12.3% margin it booked last year, based on expectations regarding its future business development.

feedItems.title: Tech-Stock Boom Pits AI Against the Fed
feedItems.description: Investors can’t agree on whether the rally looks like a repeat of 1999 or the start of something bigger.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Ukraine's fight, brave knights they be,
Battle with Rus, their might they'll see,
Forth comes the test, readiness calls,
Winter shall prove the stoutest of all.

In Eastern realm, 'tis China's feat,
Their gin-horses frail, recovery wanes,
Yet, fruitless aid to merchants' reach,
For Beijing's touch, leaves little gains.

Yon transatlantic, care divide,
A schism betwixt Europe and the States,
In gender's strife, caution they trade,
As knights of Red use 'fore thine gates.

feedItems.title: Ukraine's Offensive Is a Battle of Readiness
feedItems.description: The coming battles with Russian troops ultimately will boil down to which side has better prepared and strengthened over recent months.

feedItems.title: These Businesses Are Getting Hit Hard by China's Faltering Economic Recovery
feedItems.description: The government in Beijing has pushed banks to extend loans to small businesses, with limited success.

feedItems.title: U.S. Becomes Transgender-Care Outlier as More in Europe Urge Caution
feedItems.description: Republicans seize on European doubts over medical interventions to call for restrictions.
